text: A visor can be * The bill of a baseball cap or similar hat. * A ball cap without the crown. * An opaque panel mounted over the windshield of an automobile or other vehicle that the driver or front seat passenger can adjust to block direct sunlight. * Green eyeshade - a green tinted visor commonly associated with old fashioned accountants, telegraphers and copy editors formerly to lessen eye strain. Category:Hats
title: Visor
